Posts.Content: LalaBoo68 wrote: I live in Cyprus and had a left breast mastecomy in June of 2015 and am flying to UK end of May & then onto Caribbean before returning home to Cyprus. I normally wear a silicone prosthetic and wanted some advice about flying whilst wearing my prosthetic. Whilst the diagnosis & treatment were fantastic the after care is not as good as in UK, so it's difficult to find any answers on this subject. I would be so grateful for any information Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Flying with a silicone prosthetic LalaBoo68 arby
